name: Packed SoundFont File
summary: Learn about .SFPACK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: If you want to unpack an SFPACK file on a Linux or Mac OS X computer, you can use virtualization software to run the SFPack.EXE executable.

description: File that contains a compressed SoundFont (.SF2) file; contains a set of audio samples that can be used for creating sounds for games and other applications; can be decompressed to the SF2 file using SFPack, a an older Windows utility from Megota Software.
